campaigns.name: Adventure in the CDA
campaigns.description: A campaign in a cyberpunk universe where players navigate between the real world and the CDA.
campaigns.context: A dystopian future where technology and virtual reality dominate.

campaigns.name: The Mysteries of the Kingdom
campaigns.description: A medieval fantasy campaign full of magic, mythological creatures, and mysteries to solve.
campaigns.context: A magical kingdom where adventurers explore dungeons and face supernatural creatures.

campaigns.name: Space Wars: Galactic Conquest
campaigns.description: In a vast galaxy, players take on the role of military commanders fighting for control of key planets.
campaigns.context: A futuristic galaxy at war with advanced technology, starships, and alien species.

campaigns.name: Pirates of the Lost Seas
campaigns.description: A pirate-themed campaign where players search for a legendary treasure hidden on a mythical island.
campaigns.context: A world of pirate ships, treasure hunting, and battles on the high seas.

quests.name: Network Infiltration
quests.description: Infiltrate the data network of a corrupt corporation to obtain sensitive information.

quests.name: Saved by Technology
quests.description: Use technology to rescue an ally trapped in a defective virtual reality.

quests.name: Street Espionage
quests.description: Monitor a street filled with hackers and security agents.

quests.name: The Secret of the Ancients
quests.description: Uncover the mysterious origin of an ancient artifact that could change the course of history.

quests.name: Beast Hunter
quests.description: Hunt down a werewolf terrorizing nearby villages.

quests.name: Conquest of the Red Planet
quests.description: Establish control over the Red Planet and defend it against enemy forces.

quests.name: Alien Negotiations
quests.description: Negotiate a peace treaty with the alien species to avoid war.

quests.name: The Treasure Map
quests.description: Follow the clues on an ancient treasure map to find the legendary treasure.

quests.name: Sea Battle
quests.description: Engage in a battle with rival pirate ships over treasure.
